name: Rocket-Pet
description:
Controls:

-Move: WASD

-Shoot & use tools: Left-click

-Change tools: Right-click

-Quit: Escape

Rocket-Pet is our game for the Ludum Dare 41th Edition. 

It's the mashup between a Shoot'em up and a Tamagotchi game.

The goal is to kill people and take care of your pet, a starship.

The game is splitting in 2 phases:

1) You control the ship to eradicate a zone, populated by chickens. 

2) When you complete a zone, you take care of your pet to heal, clean and upgrade him.
